greeter.opener: Hello, stranger. Welcome to the Patwin village of Topaidihi.

greeter.closer: I have not heard of this 'seal' you’re searching for, but perhaps the others in the village have.

hunter.opener: What do you think of my fit? Cool isn’t it? I wear this to get closer to the deer so we don’t frighten them when we hunt!

hunter.request: Speaking of the hunt, we’re going out soon. Can you help me find my bow?

hunter.closer: Sweet, thanks a bunch! Here’s some berries from our previous outing. I will keep an eye out for that “seal” you’re looking for.
